name: Survive the Plague
description:
The year is 1355. The Black Death has infected your homeland, and your peaceful country life has been interrupted.

How many days will you survive? Will you make it to the castle?...

Two unique endings await your discovery.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Click - Interact

Escape - Pause Menu

This game was made completely solo by me for the Historically Accurate Game Jam 2.

Your aim in this game is twofold.

Primarily:

  • Survive.

Second:

  • Find your way into the castle to stay safe from the plague for good.

Every day you must brave the outside world, foraging for food and firewood. Make sure you're back before dark however, or you'll freeze to death! Be careful with food, the plague is around after all. Is there something hidden in the forest that can help you?...

The game is a 3GB download. If you are unable to download this much, I have a full gameplay video available below. If you can, play the game to experience everything it has to offer though. I have left out some of the secrets and one ending from the video.
